basicFacilities.name: Bedroom
basicFacilities.description: A private sleeping chamber for the bastion owner or guests. Provides a comfortable place for a Long Rest.

basicFacilities.name: Dining Room
basicFacilities.description: A communal eating area where residents and visitors gather for meals.

basicFacilities.name: Parlor
basicFacilities.description: A comfortable sitting room for entertaining guests and conducting informal meetings.

basicFacilities.name: Courtyard
basicFacilities.description: An open-air space within the bastion, used for gatherings, exercise, or decoration.

basicFacilities.name: Kitchen
basicFacilities.description: A well-equipped cooking area that produces enough food for the bastion's residents.

basicFacilities.name: Storage
basicFacilities.description: Secure storage for equipment, supplies, and treasure.

specialFacilities.name: Arcane Study
specialFacilities.description: A place of quiet research devoted to the study of the arcane arts. Bookshelves and writing desks fill the room, and the air smells of old parchment.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use an Arcane Focus or a tool as a Spellcasting Focus

charm.name: Arcane Study Charm
charm.description: You can cast Identify without expending a spell slot or using Material components. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Arcane Focus
orderOptions.description: Craft an Arcane Focus (such as a crystal, orb, rod, staff, or wand).

orderOptions.name: Craft: Book
orderOptions.description: Craft a blank book suitable for use as a spellbook or journal.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Magic Item (Arcana)
orderOptions.description: Craft a Common or Uncommon magic item chosen from the Arcana tables. Requires character level 9+.

orderOptions.name: Research: Arcane Lore
orderOptions.description: Research an arcane topic. The hireling provides an answer to one question about a spell, magic item, or arcane phenomenon.

specialFacilities.name: Armory
specialFacilities.description: This facility stores weapons, armor, and ammunition for the bastion's defense. When stocked, defenders gain advantage on attack rolls during bastion attacks.
specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: While the Armory is stocked, the bastion's defenders have Advantage on attack rolls during bastion events. Restocking after an attack costs 100 GP.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Buy Weapons/Armor
orderOptions.description: Purchase weapons or armor at standard prices through the hireling's contacts.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Sell Weapons/Armor
orderOptions.description: Sell weapons or armor for half their listed price.

specialFacilities.name: Barrack
specialFacilities.description: This facility houses trained soldiers who serve as Bastion Defenders. A Roomy barrack can hold up to 12 defenders; a Vast one holds up to 25.

orderOptions.name: Recruit: Defenders
orderOptions.description: Recruit up to 4 Bastion Defenders. The recruitment costs no money.

specialFacilities.name: Garden
specialFacilities.description: A cultivated garden that can serve decorative, culinary, herbal, or poisonous purposes. The garden type is chosen when built.

orderOptions.name: Harvest: Decorative
orderOptions.description: Harvest decorative flowers and plants worth 1d4 x 10 GP.

orderOptions.name: Harvest: Food
orderOptions.description: Harvest food sufficient to feed 20 people for 7 days.

orderOptions.name: Harvest: Herb
orderOptions.description: Harvest 1d4 Healer's Kits worth of medicinal herbs (no cost).

orderOptions.name: Harvest: Poison
orderOptions.description: Harvest 1d4 doses of Basic Poison (no cost).

specialFacilities.name: Library
specialFacilities.description: Floor-to-ceiling bookshelves fill this facility. The library contains an impressive collection of reference works on a variety of subjects.

orderOptions.name: Research: Topic
orderOptions.description: Research any topic. The hireling provides an answer to one question about history, lore, or a specific subject.

specialFacilities.name: Sanctuary
specialFacilities.description: A consecrated space for prayer, meditation, and divine communion. Holy symbols and religious icons adorn the walls.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use a Holy Symbol or Druidic Focus as a Spellcasting Focus

charm.name: Sanctuary Charm
charm.description: You can cast Healing Word without expending a spell slot. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Holy Water
orderOptions.description: Craft a flask of Holy Water.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Magic Item (Religion)
orderOptions.description: Craft a Common or Uncommon magic item from the Religion tables. Requires level 9+.

orderOptions.name: Research: Divine Lore
orderOptions.description: Research a divine topic. The hireling provides an answer to one question about a deity, celestial, or divine phenomenon.

specialFacilities.name: Smithy
specialFacilities.description: A forge for crafting weapons, armor, and metal goods. The ring of hammer on anvil fills this hot, smoky facility.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Weapon
orderOptions.description: Craft any nonmagical weapon at half the normal cost.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Armor/Shield
orderOptions.description: Craft any nonmagical armor or shield at half the normal cost.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Repair Equipment
orderOptions.description: Repair damaged weapons or armor for free.

specialFacilities.name: Storehouse
specialFacilities.description: An enlarged, secured storage area with organized shelves, crates, and locked chests. Far more capacity than a basic Storage room.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Buy Supplies
orderOptions.description: Purchase adventuring gear, tools, or supplies at standard prices.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Sell Goods
orderOptions.description: Sell stored goods for half their listed price.

specialFacilities.name: Workshop
specialFacilities.description: A versatile crafting space equipped with workbenches and up to six sets of Artisan's Tools. Ideal for creating nonmagical items.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Nonmagical Item
orderOptions.description: Craft any nonmagical item using the Workshop's Artisan's Tools at half normal cost and time.

specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: Source of Inspiration: After spending an entire Short Rest in your Workshop, you gain Heroic Inspiration. You can't gain this benefit again until you finish a Long Rest.

specialFacilities.name: Gaming Hall
specialFacilities.description: This facility is a den of games and gambling. Card tables, dice cups, and dart boards fill the space. Visitors come to test their luck.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Run Games
orderOptions.description: Run games of chance. Roll d100 on the Gaming Hall Winnings table to determine profit or loss.

specialFacilities.name: Greenhouse
specialFacilities.description: An enclosure where rare plants and fungi are nurtured in a controlled climate.

fruitOfRestoration.description: One plant in your Greenhouse has three magical fruits growing on it. Any creature that eats one of these fruits gains the benefit of a Lesser Restoration spell. Fruits that aren't eaten within 24 hours of being picked lose their magic. The plant replaces all picked fruits daily at dawn, and it can't be transplanted without killing it.

orderOptions.name: Harvest: Healing Herbs
orderOptions.description: Commission the hireling to create a Potion of Healing (Greater) made from healing herbs. The work takes 7 days and costs no money.

orderOptions.name: Harvest: Poison
orderOptions.description: Commission the hireling to extract one application of a poison from rare plants or fungi. Choose from: Assassin's Blood, Malice, Pale Tincture, or Truth Serum. The work takes 7 days and costs no money.

specialFacilities.name: Laboratory
specialFacilities.description: Glass vials, flasks, and alchemical apparatus fill this room. The laboratory is used for brewing potions and conducting alchemical experiments.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Potion of Healing
orderOptions.description: Craft a Potion of Healing.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Potion of Greater Healing
orderOptions.description: Craft a Potion of Greater Healing. Requires level 13+.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Antitoxin
orderOptions.description: Craft a vial of Antitoxin.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Alchemist's Fire
orderOptions.description: Craft a flask of Alchemist's Fire.

specialFacilities.name: Sacristy
specialFacilities.description: This room stores sacred vestments and religious items. It serves as a preparation area for religious ceremonies.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use a Holy Symbol or Druidic Focus as a Spellcasting Focus

charm.name: Sacristy Charm
charm.description: You can cast Remove Curse without expending a spell slot. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Holy Water (batch)
orderOptions.description: Craft 4 flasks of Holy Water.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Magic Item (Religion)
orderOptions.description: Craft a Common or Uncommon magic item from the Religion tables. Requires level 13+.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Bless Defenders
orderOptions.description: Bless the bastion's defenders. For the next 7 days, each defender gains +1 to attack rolls.

specialFacilities.name: Scriptorium
specialFacilities.description: Writing desks, ink pots, and stacks of parchment fill this room. The scriptorium is used for copying texts and creating spell scrolls.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Spell Scroll (Cantrip)
orderOptions.description: Craft a Spell Scroll of a cantrip you know.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Spell Scroll (1st Level)
orderOptions.description: Craft a Spell Scroll of a 1st-level spell you know.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Spell Scroll (2nd Level)
orderOptions.description: Craft a Spell Scroll of a 2nd-level spell you know.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Spell Scroll (3rd Level)
orderOptions.description: Craft a Spell Scroll of a 3rd-level spell you know. Requires level 13+.

specialFacilities.name: Stable
specialFacilities.description: Housing for mounts and beasts of burden. A Roomy stable can hold up to 3 Large creatures; a Vast stable can hold up to 6 Large creatures.
specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: Mounts stabled here recover all Hit Point Dice on a Long Rest.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Buy Mount
orderOptions.description: Purchase a mount at standard prices through the hireling's contacts.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Breed Mounts
orderOptions.description: Breed mounts over time. After 4 bastion turns, gain a young mount of a type already stabled.

specialFacilities.name: Teleportation Circle
specialFacilities.description: A permanent Teleportation Circle inscribed in the floor of this room. Only the bastion owner and those they authorize can use it.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use a Spellcasting Focus

specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: Contains a permanent Teleportation Circle. Anyone who knows the sigil sequence can teleport to this circle. The owner can link to one other permanent circle whose sigil sequence they know.

orderOptions.name: Recruit: Spellcaster
orderOptions.description: The NPC spellcaster can cast a Wizard spell of level 4 or lower (or level 8 if you are level 17+). The spellcaster stays for 14 days or until a spell is cast.

specialFacilities.name: Theater
specialFacilities.description: A stage, seating, and acoustic design make this facility ideal for performances. Musicians, actors, and orators can entertain audiences here.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Inspire
orderOptions.description: Host an inspiring performance. Choose one ally who attends; they gain Inspiration.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Host Performance
orderOptions.description: Host a public performance. Earn 2d6 x 25 GP in admission fees.

specialFacilities.name: Training Area
specialFacilities.description: An open space for martial practice and physical training, with practice dummies, sparring rings, and weapon racks.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Battle Training
orderOptions.description: The trainer provides battle instruction. You gain +1 to attack rolls with one weapon type for 7 days.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Skill Training
orderOptions.description: The trainer teaches a skill. You gain proficiency in one skill for 7 days.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Tool Training
orderOptions.description: The trainer teaches tool use. You gain proficiency with one Artisan's Tool for 7 days.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Unarmed Combat
orderOptions.description: The trainer teaches unarmed combat. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 damage for 7 days.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Weapon Training
orderOptions.description: The trainer teaches advanced weapon techniques. You gain a weapon mastery property for one weapon for 7 days.

specialFacilities.name: Trophy Room
specialFacilities.description: A showcase for trophies, relics, and mementos of adventures. Visitors are impressed by the displays.
specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: Visitors who see the trophy room are favorably disposed toward you. You have Advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks with NPCs who have seen it.

orderOptions.name: Research: Lore
orderOptions.description: Commission the facility to research a topic related to a trophy on display. The hireling provides an answer to one question about the trophy's origin, history, or significance.

orderOptions.name: Research: Trinket Trophy
orderOptions.description: Roll on the Implements table for a chance to discover a magical trinket among the collection.

specialFacilities.name: Archive
specialFacilities.description: A vast collection of books, scrolls, and rare manuscripts organized with meticulous care. The archive holds knowledge on specialized subjects.

orderOptions.name: Research: Deep Lore
orderOptions.description: Research a topic in depth. The hireling provides comprehensive answers to up to 3 questions on a single topic.

orderOptions.name: Research: Identify Magic Item
orderOptions.description: Identify the properties of a magic item left in the archive.

specialFacilities.name: Meditation Chamber
specialFacilities.description: A tranquil room designed for deep meditation and mental focus. Incense burns softly and the walls absorb sound.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Deep Meditation
orderOptions.description: Meditate deeply. Recover one expended spell slot of 5th level or lower.

specialFacilities.name: Menagerie
specialFacilities.description: A collection of exotic creatures housed in comfortable enclosures. The menagerie can hold creatures of various sizes.
specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: Creatures in the menagerie can serve as Bastion Defenders. The menagerie can hold up to 6 Medium or smaller creatures, or 3 Large creatures, or 1 Huge creature.

orderOptions.name: Recruit: Acquire Creature
orderOptions.description: Acquire a creature for the menagerie. Cost varies by creature type and CR.

specialFacilities.name: Observatory
specialFacilities.description: A domed tower with a powerful telescope and star charts. The observatory is used for celestial observation and divination.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use a Spellcasting Focus

charm.name: Observatory Charm
charm.description: You can cast Contact Other Plane without expending a spell slot. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Research: Celestial Reading
orderOptions.description: Study the stars. The hireling provides insight into one future event or question (as the Augury spell, but more detailed).

orderOptions.name: Research: Navigate
orderOptions.description: Calculate a route. Gain Advantage on Survival checks to navigate for the next 7 days.

specialFacilities.name: Pub
specialFacilities.description: A cozy tavern within the bastion that serves drinks and food. The pub attracts visitors and generates income through its magical beverages.

orderOptions.name: Research: Information Gathering
orderOptions.description: Commission the bartender to gather information from spies aware of important events within 10 miles of your Bastion over the next 7 days. These spies can divulge the location of any creature familiar to you within 50 miles (not hidden by magic). They also learn where that creature has been for the previous 7 days.

specials.name: Bigby's Burden
specials.effect: Drinking a pint grants you the 'enlarge' effect of an Enlarge/Reduce spell with a duration of 24 hours (no saving throw allowed).

specials.name: Kiss of the Spider Queen
specials.effect: Drinking a pint grants you the effect of a Spider Climb spell with a duration of 24 hours.

specials.name: Moonlight Serenade
specials.effect: Drinking a pint gives you Darkvision out to 60 feet for 24 hours. If you already have Darkvision, its range is extended by 60 feet for the same duration.

specials.name: Positive Reinforcement
specials.effect: Drinking a pint gives you Resistance to Necrotic damage for 24 hours.

specials.name: Sterner Stuff
specials.effect: For 24 hours after drinking a pint, you automatically succeed on saving throws to avoid or end the Frightened condition.

specialFacilities.enlargeDescription: You can enlarge your Pub to a Vast facility by spending 2,000 GP. If you do so, the Pub can have two magical beverages from the Pub Special list on tap at a time. A Vast Pub gains three additional hirelings (servers), for a total of four.

specialFacilities.name: Reliquary
specialFacilities.description: A secured vault for storing and displaying holy relics, cursed items, and objects of great power. Protective wards guard the contents.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use a Holy Symbol or Druidic Focus as a Spellcasting Focus

charm.name: Reliquary Charm
charm.description: You can cast Greater Restoration without expending a spell slot. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Research: Identify Relic
orderOptions.description: Study a relic or cursed item to learn its full properties and history.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Ward
orderOptions.description: Place a protective ward on the bastion. For 7 days, hostile creatures have Disadvantage on attack rolls while inside.

specialFacilities.name: Demiplane
specialFacilities.description: A small extradimensional space accessible only through a door in the bastion. The demiplane is a 30-foot cube of whatever environment you desire.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use a Spellcasting Focus

specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: The demiplane is a 30-foot cube that can take any form you desire. Time passes normally inside. The door is invisible from the outside and can only be opened by you.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Reshape
orderOptions.description: Reshape the demiplane's environment, furnishings, and appearance.

specialFacilities.name: Guildhall
specialFacilities.description: A meeting hall for guild members. The guildhall attracts skilled professionals who can provide services and generate income.
specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: You can recruit skilled hirelings through the guild. Guild members provide a 10% discount on services related to the guild's trade.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Guild Services
orderOptions.description: Offer guild services to visitors. Earn 3d6 x 50 GP in fees.

orderOptions.name: Recruit: Skilled Hireling
orderOptions.description: Recruit a skilled NPC through guild contacts for a specific task.

guildTypes.name: Adventurers' Guild
guildTypes.description: A guild for adventurers seeking quests and companions. Members share rumors and job postings.

guildTypes.name: Bakers' Guild
guildTypes.description: A guild for bakers and pastry chefs. Members provide food for events at reduced cost.

guildTypes.name: Brewers' Guild
guildTypes.description: A guild for brewers and vintners. Members supply beverages and know local gossip.

guildTypes.name: Masons' Guild
guildTypes.description: A guild for stonemasons and builders. Members can assist with bastion construction at reduced cost.

guildTypes.name: Shipbuilders' Guild
guildTypes.description: A guild for shipwrights and sailors. Members can arrange sea transport and naval repairs.

guildTypes.name: Thieves' Guild
guildTypes.description: A secretive guild for rogues and spies. Members can gather intelligence and fence stolen goods.

specialFacilities.name: Sanctum
specialFacilities.description: The ultimate magical workshop, combining features of an Arcane Study, Laboratory, and Scriptorium. Powerful wards protect the room.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use a Holy Symbol or Druidic Focus as a Spellcasting Focus

charm.name: Sanctum Charm
charm.description: You can cast Heal without expending a spell slot. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Rare Magic Item
orderOptions.description: Craft a Rare magic item. Requires special materials (DM discretion).

orderOptions.name: Craft: Spell Scroll (4th-5th Level)
orderOptions.description: Craft a Spell Scroll of a 4th or 5th-level spell you know.

orderOptions.name: Research: Create Spell
orderOptions.description: Research the creation of a new spell (DM adjudicates results).

specialFacilities.name: War Room
specialFacilities.description: A strategic command center with maps, tactical resources, and communication equipment. The war room coordinates bastion defense and military operations.

prerequisite.description: Fighting Style feature or Unarmored Defense feature

orderOptions.name: Research: Intelligence Gathering
orderOptions.description: Gather intelligence on a region or enemy. Learn detailed information about military forces, defenses, or movements.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Tactical Advantage
orderOptions.description: Plan a tactical operation. Choose up to 6 allies; for the next 7 days, they cannot be surprised.

specialFacilities.name: Amethyst Dragon Den
specialFacilities.description: A crystalline chamber that attracts a young amethyst dragon as an ally. The dragon provides psionic assistance and serves as a powerful defender.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use a Spellcasting Focus

specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: A young amethyst dragon lairs here. The dragon serves as a powerful Bastion Defender (CR 4) and can provide psionic readings.

orderOptions.name: Research: Psionic Reading
orderOptions.description: The amethyst dragon performs a psionic reading, revealing information about a creature or object you describe.

specialFacilities.name: Harper Hideout
specialFacilities.description: A secret meeting place for Harper agents, disguised as an ordinary room. Hidden compartments and encoded messages fill the space.

orderOptions.name: Research: Harper Intelligence
orderOptions.description: The Harper agent gathers intelligence on a topic. Gain detailed information about a person, place, or organization.

specialFacilities.name: Red Wizard Necropolis
specialFacilities.description: A dark chamber where necromantic rituals raise undead servants. The dead serve as tireless workers and defenders.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use an Arcane Focus as a Spellcasting Focus

specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: Undead defenders raised here do not require food, water, or pay. They follow simple orders without question.

orderOptions.name: Recruit: Undead Defenders
orderOptions.description: Raise up to 4 undead defenders (Skeletons or Zombies). No gold cost, but requires corpses or bones.

specialFacilities.name: Zhentarim Travel Station
specialFacilities.description: A waystation for Zhentarim caravans, providing secure storage, fresh horses, and trade connections across the network.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Zhentarim Commerce
orderOptions.description: Use the Zhentarim trade network. Buy or sell goods at 10% better than market price.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Smuggle Goods
orderOptions.description: Smuggle goods through the network. Earn 2d6 x 50 GP, but risk attracting attention (10% chance of Bastion Attack event).

specialFacilities.name: Emerald Enclave Grove
specialFacilities.description: A sacred grove tended by Emerald Enclave members. Rare plants and animals thrive here under druidic protection.

charm.name: Grove Charm
charm.description: You can cast Plant Growth without expending a spell slot. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Harvest: Rare Natural Materials
orderOptions.description: Harvest rare herbs, mosses, and fungi worth 2d6 x 25 GP.

orderOptions.name: Recruit: Animal Companion
orderOptions.description: Attract a beast companion from the grove (similar to Menagerie creatures).

specialFacilities.name: Lords' Alliance Noble Residence
specialFacilities.description: An opulent wing of the bastion designed to host Lords' Alliance dignitaries. Fine furnishings and secure meeting rooms provide diplomatic advantages.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Diplomatic Meeting
orderOptions.description: Host a diplomatic meeting. Gain Advantage on Persuasion checks with nobility and government officials for 7 days.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Alliance Resources
orderOptions.description: Request resources from the Lords' Alliance. Receive 500 GP worth of supplies or military aid.

specialFacilities.name: Order of the Gauntlet Tournament Field
specialFacilities.description: A grand tournament field where Order of the Gauntlet knights train and compete. Jousting lists, archery ranges, and melee rings provide martial training.

prerequisite.description: Renown 3+ with the Order of the Gauntlet

orderOptions.name: Empower: Tournament Training
orderOptions.description: Train in tournament combat. Gain +2 to attack rolls with lances, longswords, or longbows for 7 days.

orderOptions.name: Recruit: Knight Defenders
orderOptions.description: Recruit Order knights as defenders (CR 1/2 each). Up to 2 per turn.

specialFacilities.name: Cult of the Dragon Archive
specialFacilities.description: A hidden archive of draconic lore, including secrets of dragon transformation and dracolich creation. Knowledge is power here.

prerequisite.description: Renown 10+ with the Cult of the Dragon

charm.name: Draconic Lore Charm
charm.description: You can cast Fear without expending a spell slot. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Research: Draconic Secrets
orderOptions.description: Research draconic lore. Learn detailed information about dragon types, lairs, or hoards.

orderOptions.name: Research: Dracolich Lore
orderOptions.description: Research the forbidden art of dracolich creation (purely academic, of course).

specialFacilities.name: Dragonmark Outpost
specialFacilities.description: A trade outpost connected to one of Eberron's dragonmarked houses, providing access to their specialized services and trade networks.

orderOptions.name: Trade: House Services
orderOptions.description: Access dragonmarked house services at a 15% discount. Services depend on the specific house.

orderOptions.name: Trade: House Commerce
orderOptions.description: Use the house's trade network. Buy or sell goods at favorable rates, earning 1d6 x 50 GP profit.

specialFacilities.name: Kundarak Vault
specialFacilities.description: A heavily warded vault built with House Kundarak security techniques. Nearly impregnable, the vault protects the most valuable treasures.
specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: Items stored in the vault cannot be stolen by bastion events. The vault holds up to 50,000 GP worth of treasure.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Banking Services
orderOptions.description: Access House Kundarak banking. Deposit gold and earn 1% interest per bastion turn.

specialFacilities.name: Navigator's Helm
specialFacilities.description: A navigation center equipped with House Lyrandar charts and weather-prediction instruments, designed for airship or ship operations.

orderOptions.name: Research: Weather Prediction
orderOptions.description: Predict weather patterns for the next 7 days with perfect accuracy.

orderOptions.name: Research: Navigation
orderOptions.description: Plot an optimal route to any destination. Travel time is reduced by 25%.

specialFacilities.name: Orien Helm
specialFacilities.description: A teleportation relay station connected to House Orien's transportation network. Provides long-distance transportation services.
specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: Functions as a limited Teleportation Circle connected to the House Orien network. Can transport up to 6 creatures to any Orien station.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Courier Service
orderOptions.description: Send or receive packages through the Orien network. Delivery within 1d4 days.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Passenger Transport
orderOptions.description: Arrange transportation for up to 6 passengers to an Orien station. Cost: 50 GP per passenger.

specialFacilities.name: Artificer's Forge
specialFacilities.description: A specialized workshop for creating magical items using Eberron's unique artifice techniques. Dragonshards and schema line the walls.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use Artisan's Tools as a Spellcasting Focus (Artificer)

charm.name: Artificer's Charm
charm.description: You can cast Magic Weapon (at 4th level) without expending a spell slot. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Common Magic Item
orderOptions.description: Craft a Common magic item using artifice techniques.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Uncommon Magic Item
orderOptions.description: Craft an Uncommon magic item using artifice techniques.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Rare Magic Item
orderOptions.description: Craft a Rare magic item. Requires special dragonshards.

specialFacilities.name: Inquisitive's Agency
specialFacilities.description: A detective agency specializing in investigation and intelligence gathering, staffed by professional inquisitives.

prerequisite.description: Expertise in Investigation, Insight, or Perception

orderOptions.name: Research: Investigate Person
orderOptions.description: Investigate a person's background, associates, and activities. Full dossier in 7 days.

orderOptions.name: Research: Investigate Location
orderOptions.description: Scout a location and report on defenses, inhabitants, and points of entry.

orderOptions.name: Research: Surveillance
orderOptions.description: Place a target under surveillance. Learn their daily routine and contacts.

specialFacilities.name: Lyrandar Helm
specialFacilities.description: An advanced weather-control station using House Lyrandar's Mark of Storm. Can manipulate weather patterns around the bastion.
specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: The bastion and surrounding 1-mile radius have controlled weather. Crops always thrive, and severe weather cannot damage the bastion.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Weather Control
orderOptions.description: Control weather in a 5-mile radius for 24 hours. Choose the conditions.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Storm Defense
orderOptions.description: Call a storm to defend the bastion. During attacks, each attacker takes 2d6 lightning damage.

specialFacilities.name: Manifest Zone
specialFacilities.description: A room built around a manifest zone  a place where one of Eberron's planes bleeds into the Material Plane. The zone's effects depend on the linked plane.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use a Spellcasting Focus

specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: The manifest zone provides passive benefits based on the linked plane. Irian: healing spells heal +2 HP. Thelanis: illusion spells have +1 DC. Fernia: fire spells deal +2 damage.

orderOptions.name: Empower: Planar Attunement
orderOptions.description: Attune to the manifest zone's energy. Gain a benefit related to the linked plane for 7 days.

specialFacilities.name: Museum
specialFacilities.description: A curated collection of artifacts, historical items, and curiosities from across Eberron. The museum attracts scholars and tourists.

charm.name: Museum Charm
charm.description: You can cast Locate Object without expending a spell slot. Once you use this charm, it vanishes.

orderOptions.name: Trade: Admission Fees
orderOptions.description: Open the museum to visitors. Earn 2d6 x 25 GP in admission fees.

orderOptions.name: Research: Artifact Lore
orderOptions.description: Research an artifact in the collection. Learn its full history and properties.

specialFacilities.name: Construct Forge
specialFacilities.description: A specialized forge for creating magical constructs  tireless servants and powerful defenders animated by arcane power.

prerequisite.description: Ability to use Artisan's Tools as a Spellcasting Focus (Artificer)

specialFacilities.permanentBenefit: Constructs created here do not require food, water, or rest. They serve as tireless workers and powerful defenders.

orderOptions.name: Craft: Homunculus
orderOptions.description: Create a Homunculus servant (CR 0, Tiny construct).

orderOptions.name: Craft: Iron Defender
orderOptions.description: Create an Iron Defender (CR 1, Medium construct).

orderOptions.name: Craft: Shield Guardian
orderOptions.description: Create a Shield Guardian (CR 7, Large construct). Requires special materials.

orderOptions.name: Recruit: Construct Defenders
orderOptions.description: Assign existing constructs as bastion defenders.
